name: Scarlet
text: [Activate: Main] You may trash this Character: Play up to 1 {Dressrosa} type Character card other than [Scarlet] with a cost of 3 or less from your hand rested. Then, give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters Cost -2 during this turn.
